headline: MGM Resorts International (MGM): A Bull Case Theory
summary: We came across a bullish thesis on MGM Resorts International (MGM) on Substack by Stock Analysis Compilation. In this article, we will summarize the bulls’ thesis on MGM. MGM Resorts International (MGM)’s share was trading at $34.29 as of Dec 23rd. MGM’s trailing and forward P/E were 12.29 and 13.37 respectively according to Yahoo Finance. MGM presents […]
